properties.address: The Institute,, Skipton, North Yorkshire BD23 6RE
properties.description: This is a small, friendly library situated in the local community centre. It has free computer access for library members, seating, and a study table. There is a weekly knit and natter group on Mondays and a monthly Rhyme-time session.
properties.title: Embsay with Eastby Community Library

properties.address: Fisher Medical Centre, North Yorkshire BD23 1EU
properties.description: Nurturing Growth Project Well Being Group runs weekly on Thursdays Sept 2023-25th -April 2024 excluding 30th Nov-15th Feb Refreshments Crafts and Games 10.15 am-12.45 pm Mindful walk 10.30 am-11 am Group singing 11 am-12 pm Yoga 1 pm -2 pm- pay as you feel
properties.title: Fisher Medical Community Centre Skipton

properties.address: 2 Garrs Lane, Skipton, North Yorkshire BD23 5AT
properties.description: The space is open to all. Large room upstairs with some daytime activities which people can join in with including chess club, family history group, knit n natter. Jigsaws, magazines etc provided at other times. Hot drinks and biscuits available.
properties.title: Grassington Hub and Community Library

properties.address: 1A Mill Bridge, N Yorks, N Yorks BD23 1NJ
properties.description: Open from 13/12/2022. The "warm space" is in the cafe in the same building as Holy Trinity church (at the top of Skipton High Street). On Tuesday mornings we offer a quiet space, free wifi, hot drinks, and games for children. Other days the cafe operates at local prices.
properties.title: Holy Trinity Church, Skipton

properties.address: Morrisons Supermarket, Skipton, North Yorkshire BD23 1FL
properties.description: The space is open to all. Customers would be expected to buy a drink and/or some food to seat at a table. Thank you.
properties.title: Morrisons Cafe

properties.address: Station Square, Pateley Bridge, North Yorkshire HG3 5AT
properties.description: Community Library, open Monday 10.00 - 17.00, Tuesday - Friday 10.00 - 16.00, Saturday 10.00 - 13.00. Hot drinks, a friendly welcome and a warm place to sit and read or do jigsaws.
properties.title: Nidderdale Plus Community Hub

properties.address: Newmarket Street, Skipton, North Yorkshire BD23 2JE
properties.description: Come and connect and relax in our safe and friendly space. We have a large hall and cafe area and we provide a good range of free refreshments as well as pay-as-you-feel hot food. There is an arts and crafts group (supported by local artist from Pioneer Projects), various board games and jigsaws, a quiet space and a pop-up food pantry. Everyone is most welcome!
properties.title: Skipton Community Wellbeing Café

properties.address: North Yorkshire Council, North Yorkshire BD23 1JX
properties.title: Skipton Libraries

properties.address: Trinity St Andrew's Church, Westmoreland St, Skipton, North Yorkshire BD23 2EA
properties.description: Open from 03-11-2023 12.30-1.30pm hot meal served 1.30-3.30pm refreshments and conversation. Games are also available
properties.title: Trinity St Andrew's Warm Space

properties.description: Large accessible hall and adjoining coffee shop with free hot drinks and other refreshments, plus discounted hot food, art and craft activities, pop-up food pantry, games and jigsaws etc. Friendly volunteers and signposting to other support.
properties.title: Skipton Community Wellbeing Cafe

properties.address: Trinity Methodist Church, Westmoreland St, BD23 2EA
properties.description: Soup lunch 12.30-1.30), tea and coffee, conversation, charging points, WIFI, games, all free
